meanings.definition: Not inclined to join social clubs or groups.
meanings.sent1: She is so unclubbable that she prefers to spend her evenings alone.
meanings.sent2: The unclubbable cat always hides when visitors come over.
meanings.sent3: It's quite unclubbable of him to decline all the party invitations.
meanings.sent4: Her unclubbable nature is like a fortress, keeping everyone at a distance.
meanings.sent5: The unclubbable man's solitude is as deep as the ocean.

meanings.sent1: The unclubbable dog growled at anyone who tried to pet him.
meanings.sent2: She found him unclubbable because he never smiled or spoke to anyone.
meanings.sent3: It's hard not to laugh at the unclubbable cat's grumpy face.
meanings.sent4: His unclubbable demeanor was like a dark cloud over the party.
meanings.sent5: The unclubbable girl's coldness made her classmates uneasy.

meanings.definition: Unsuitable for membership in a club.
meanings.sent1: His unclubbable behavior made him unwelcome in the exclusive group.
meanings.sent2: The unclubbable dress code prevented many from entering the party.
meanings.sent3: It was unclubbable of the restaurant to turn away customers for not wearing ties.
meanings.sent4: The unclubbable shoes were not allowed on the golf course.
meanings.sent5: The unclubbable attitude of the bouncer kept the troublemakers out.
